Name: ELECTRON
Text: You're in a star, duh. And you're stuck with me.

Name: ELECTRON
Text: *sigh* I'm just a boring old electron.

Name: ELECTRON
Text: I have a negative charge, so I stay near positive objects like you.

Name: PROTON
Text: Aww, thanksss! People do say I have a positive personality.

Name: ELECTRON
Text: Ugh. This is going to get reeeeaaaallll annoying.

Name: PROTON
Text: Hey! No need to be so negative!

Name: ELECTRON
Text: Actually, I DO need to be negative. Otherwise I'd be a... a...

Name: ELECTRON
Text: A boring old NEUTRON!! Those guys have no personality...

Name: PROTON
Text: So, uh... what are we doing here?

Name: ELECTRON
Text: As I said earlier, we're in a star. This is where lots of Hydrogens are.

Name: ELECTRON
Text: Yep. Hydrogen's the first element in the periodic table.

Name: ELECTRON
Text: It's just one proton (that's you), and usually has one electron around it (that's me).

Name: PROTON
Text: Woah, cool! We're like a dynamic duo!

Name: ELECTRON
Text: ...I have been reduced to merely a sidekick...

Name: PROTON
Text: Hey, electron, let's explore this place! Maybe we'll meet some other elements!

Name: PROTON
Text: I'll take the lead and you can follow - here we go!!
